meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>wife</kanji> <kanji>person</kanji> is a <vocabulary>lady</vocabulary>, because I guess ladies are wife people? I'm guessing this is pretty sexist somewhere, somehow, but words were made a long time ago so hopefully you can give all those dead people a break.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
